item.title: Hugo
item.description:
Hugo

Hugo is a static site generator developed in Go. You write pure plain markdown text files, and Hugo build the HTML website for you.

Installing Hugo in your System

In macOS, you can install Hugo using Homebrew.

  • brew update
  • brew install hugo

Creating New Hugo Project

To create a fresh new site, you can use Hugo CLI:

hugo new site mysite
cd mysite
